I‚Äôve tried multiple places over the years and Bloomie Nails has truly been the best manicure and pedicure place I‚Äôve been to! I‚Äôve now been going to them consistently every few weeks over the past year and have always had a great experience! originalText.text: Love my newly done nails! Simon is really pro and nice. I showed him the reference pictures but not entirely sure what I wanted, he was patient and helpful. We did a gradient design, the nail came out nice, very satisfied,  had a great experience! Recommended!

text.text: Love my newly done nails! Simon is really pro and nice. I showed him the reference pictures but not entirely sure what I wanted, he was patient and helpful. We did a gradient design, the nail came out nice, very satisfied,  had a great experience! Recommended!

originalText.text: Vivi did my nails and massage and was amazing!! Loved the powder dip ombre of orchid and gold! Bloomies is always great!

text.text: Vivi did my nails and massage and was amazing!! Loved the powder dip ombre of orchid and gold! Bloomies is always great!

originalText.text: By far one of the best nails spa in the Chelsea neighborhood.  The staff is friendly and courteous and always aim to please whether a longtime custom, a first time drop in or someone in town for business or vacation.  I have been a regular customer for nearly 6 years.  During that time Simon has been my nail professional. He is hardworking, always ready for me at my scheduled appointments.  He takes good care of my hands and feet and takes his time to provide the necessary treatments making me look my best and leaving satisfied. I can't say enough good things about him.  I encourage you to give him a try, I assure you, you won't be disappointed and you will likely become a regular customer like me.

originalText.text:
I came here for the 2nd time only because it is conveniently located to my place. I didn‚Äôt mind the unfriendliness at first, but then at the end when my nail tech demanded 20% tip I was quite surprised. Not only was he rude, I asked for oval nails and I got square. Fine. I went home and noticed 4 of my shellac nails  were missing color on the sides of my nails. Fine. Still I had no formal complaints.

2 days later my nail chips, I go in he does a quick fix. Following day, my nail chips again (same nail). I go back and this time they say it‚Äôs my fault. As if I‚Äôve never had a set of shellac nails before!

Needless to say, I now understand why this salon is always empty and the one on the next street is super busy.

Save your time and money!
